content: America, we have come so far. We have seen so much. But there is so much more to do. So tonight, let us ask ourselves, if our children should live to see the next century, if my daughters should be so lucky to live as long as Ann Nixon Cooper, what change will they see? What progress will we have made?
translations: ita:America, abbiamo fatto tanta strada. Abbiamo visto così tanto. Ma c'è ancora tanto da fare. Quindi questa sera chiediamo
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by unknown (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
